events.message: I recently purchased a pair of shoes but they don't fit properly. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund due to their inquiry about returning the shoes and getting their money back.
The case has been assigned to the refund processing team for further assistance in handling the customer's request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I understand you want to request a refund for your shoes that don't fit.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the shoes are unused and in their original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. Yes, the shoes are still unused and packed as received.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process and you should receive a confirmation email within 24 hours.
Thanks for the prompt response and processing my refund quickly. I appreciate your help!
The refund has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved. Please check your email for confirmation.
We wanted to check in to ensure you received your refund without any issues. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
As there has been no further correspondence, we will now close this support case. Thank you for choosing our services.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback about your recent refund experience with us.
